data.text: Yuba mɔn yi falan ti, a naxa,
“N ma mawugan mɔn findixi murutɛn nan na to,
Xa n yi a kolon nun Ala dɛnaxan yi,
n yi n ma mawugan yita a ra,
Nayi, n yi a kolonma nɛn
A yi kelɛ n xili ma a sɛnbɛ gbeeni ba?
n na a fen n kɔmɛnna ma,
Anu, a n ma kiraan kolon.
N biraxi a san funfun nan tun fɔxɔ ra,
N mi tondi a yamarine suxɛ,
Koni, a na fena nde ragidi,
Nanara, n gaxuma Ala yɛɛ ra.
Ala bata n tunnaxɔlɔ n ma,
Koni hali dimin to so n ma,
